steps.name: When User logs in the username "Admin" and password "admin123"
Then User navigate to PIM Page
Then User verify the PIM Page Header
When user clicks on Add Employee
And user enters first name "Rahul" and last name "Kumar"
And user uploads photo "/Users/akumar/Desktop/ironMan.png"
